attributes.action: Debate in the House of Commons whether NHS funding will be subject to an inquiry
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bmj.com/content/351/bmj.h3971

The CEO of NHS England is a U.S. Privatisation expert

The health secretary Jeremy Hunt wrote a paper in 2005 advocating the dismantling of the NHS
attributes.background: There has been a proposal to look at alternative funding for the NHS including through insurance and charges. If this change were made it would signal the end of the NHS as it is intended, free at the point of access to all, regardless of ability to pay.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a debate on how the NHS is funded.
